title.narrative: Upgrading of the Mikumi - Ifakara road to bitumen standard - Kidatu - Ifakara section including the Great Ruaha Bridge

description.narrative: In the framework of the SAGCOT Agricultural Initiative and aimed to reduce transport cost of access to the Market from the Kilombero cluster to the Tanzanian national road and port network, this construction works focus on the upgrading of the existing 66.9 Km dirt road to the asphalt concrete standard.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

organisation.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Tanzania

department.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to Tanzania

description.narrative: United Republic of Tanzania, Morogoro region, Mikumi and Kidatu districts

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation

Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)
